channel.title: PI Shop help
channel.description:
Im on a project Insanity as it says in the Title.
My question is: Where can I make it where instead of a shop asking for item 995 ( Coins ) it asks for 12852 ( Fist of guthix Token ) the items in that shop?
Anyone know how to do this?
